author: Abdalla, S
adress: Univ Jordan, Sch Sci, Dept Biol Sci, Amman, Jordan
title: Correlations of Expression Levels of a Panel of Genes (IRF5, STAT4, TNFSF4, MECP2, and TLR7) and Cytokine Levels (IL-2, IL-6, IL-10, IL-12, IFN-gamma, and TNF-alpha) with Systemic Lupus Erythematosus Outcomes in Jordanian Patients
